execs.name: Graeme Crawley
execs.bio: My job on PhaseOne is to ensure our respective teams are functioning properly and that any issues are resolved as smoothly as possible. I enjoy solving problems and working with others, and PhaseOne has made that something that I continue to love.

execs.name: Tai Rui Tong
execs.bio: As the president of Phaseone, I have the great privilege of setting the vision and steering one of the most innovative clubs on campus. PhaseOne’s impact on campus over the last 3 years has been substantial in providing the necessary education and motivation for students to pursue either a hobby or career in software. PhaseOne’s goal’s from the beginning has always been the students. As the president I will lead PhaseOne to continuously pursue this endeavour of providing barrier free technology education for the students at McMaster University.

execs.name: Azmain Shayakh
execs.bio: I am the Chief Financial Officer for PhaseOne and fourth year commerce student having just returned from a 12-month internship. I am very passionate about disruptive technologies that impact the advancement of human civilization. Having joined PhaseOne in 2015, I am very excited to contribute towards building PhaseOne into one of the best clubs at McMaster University.
